# numberOfTouchesRequired

**Instance Property**

The number of necessary touches on a Touch Bar for the gesture recognizer to match.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var numberOfTouchesRequired: Int { get set }
```

## Related Documentation

- **NSTouchBar**: An object that provides dynamic contextual controls in the Touch Bar of supported models of MacBook Pro.

## Configuring the Gesture Recognizer

- **allowableMovement**: The maximum movement of the mouse in the view before the gesture fails.
- **buttonMask**: A bit mask of the buttons required to recognize this press.
- **minimumPressDuration**: The minimum time (in seconds) that the user must hold the mouse button in the view for a valid gesture.
